query.UserInfo: Select USER_ID, user_login_id, user_pw, USER_NAME, user_area, user_position_id, info_tel, info_hp From NC_N_USER AS U Inner Join NC_N_INFO AS I On (U.user_id = I.info_user_id) where user_login_id = '%s' And user_pw = '%s' And isnull(user_retire,0) = 0
query._NeoMembers: Select USER_ID, user_login_id, USER_NAME, user_area from NC_N_USER Where ISNULL(user_retire,0) = 0 And NOT ISNULL(USER_NAME,'') = '' Order By user_area, USER_ID
query._HospInfo: Select %s From NC_H_USER AS U INNER JOIN NC_H_INFO AS I ON U.user_id = i.info_user_id Where U.user_med_id = '%s'
